DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find whether use multiple subcisions several visit improve appearance roll acne scar compare treatment . This study pilot study design determine feasibility procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Multiple Subcisions Rolling Acne Scars
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 65 2 . Have bilateral roll acne scar side face 3 . No active ongoing acne . 4 . The subject good health 5 . The subject willingness ability understand provide inform consent use tissue communicate investigator . 1 . Under 18 year age 2 . Pregnancy Lactation 3 . Subjects unable understand protocol give inform consent 4 . Subjects mental illness 5 . Recent Accutane use past 6 month 6 . Subjects prone hypertrophic keloidal scar 7 . Subjects report blood disease ( HIV , Hepatitis , etc . ) 8 . Subjects report history Herpes ( oral genital )
